snippet: President Obama and President Karzai described some encouraging progress, but they still have some big decisions to make.
abstract: Editorial presents several pressing questions concerning drawdown of Afghanistan war following joint news conference by Pres Obama and Pres Hamid Karzai; holds top priority remains a specific timetable for withdrawing 66,000 American troops.
lead_paragraph: President Obama and President Karzai described some encouraging progress, but they still have some big decisions to make.

headline.seo: Is This the Afghan War’s Last Chapter?

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
